snippet: Bags containing drugs, hundreds of drivers’ licenses and other items were retrieved last week from the home of a former Maricopa County sheriff’s deputy who was found dead there.
abstract: Arizona officials recover evidence bags containing drugs, hundreds of drivers’ licenses and other items from the home of Ramon Armendariz, former Maricopa County sheriff’s deputy, who was found dead there apparently of suicide when officers showed up to arrest him.
lead_paragraph: Bags containing drugs, hundreds of drivers’ licenses and other items were retrieved last week from the home of a former Maricopa County sheriff’s deputy who was found dead there.

headline.main: Ex-Deputy in Arizona Kept Cache of Evidence
headline.print_headline: Ex-Deputy In Arizona Kept Bags Of Evidence
